name: Cy's Quest: Journey To New York
name_original: Cy's Quest: Journey To New York
description: THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT AND ONLY HAS LEVEL ONE. At the moment this project is at a standstill cause a tutorial series I'm watching hasn't finished and I am waiting for more. This is my first game! Upcoming features: More levels (obviously), story, bosses, different enviorments and music! Feedback and ideas help although idk what feedback you can give for one level lol
